0.text:
Innate: Skarner's presence spawns  6 Crystal Spires at set points across the battlefield:
One beside  Baron Nashor's pit
One beside  Dragon's pit
One nearby each buff  monster's camp

1.text: After  minions have spawned, a Crystal Spire can be captured by  champions by standing on it for 2 seconds, Once captured, the Crystal Spire is owned by the team until contested, and the defending team can stand on the spire to prevent the opposing team from capturing it.

2.text: Capturing a Crystal Spire grants  sight of its radius for 1.5 seconds and locks it out from capture for 15 seconds. This also grants  30 split among its captors or  15 for a single captor.

3.text: Skarner gains Crystal Charge while within range of a Crystal Spire controlled by his team, for 1.25 seconds after triggering  Crystal Venom, and for 1.75 seconds after stinging an enemy champion with  Impale.

4.text: Crystal Charge: Skarner gains 70 − 120 (based on level)  bonus movement speed, 43% − 160% (based on level)  bonus attack speed and restores  1% maximum mana every 0.5 seconds.

5.text: Crystal Spires near buff monsters start the game already captured by the side's respective team.

0.text: Active: Skarner slashes around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.

1.text: If Crystal Slash hits an enemy, the next cast within 5 seconds also deals bonus magic damage.

0.content: 1 / 1.5 / 2 / 2.5 / 3% of target's maximum health (+ 20% AD) (+ 30% AP)

1.content: 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 / 6% of target's maximum health (+ 40% AD) (+ 30% AP)

2.text: Basic attacks  reduce Crystal Slash's cooldown by 0.25 seconds, increased to 1 second against  champions.

0.text: Active: Skarner gains a  shield for up to 6 seconds.

1.text: While the shield persists, Skarner gains  bonus movement speed that doubles over the first 3 seconds.

0.text: Passive: Every time Skarner triggers Crystal Venom or stings an enemy with  Impale, Fracture's cooldown is  reduced by the corresponding base duration of the disable.

1.text: Active: Skarner launches a blast of crystalline energy in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  slows them for 2.5 seconds, as well as marking them with Crystal Venom for 5 seconds.

2.text: Crystal Venom: Skarner's next basic attack against a marked target consumes the mark to deal bonus physical damage and  stun them for 1.25 seconds.

0.text:
Active: Skarner  roots the target enemy  champion over the cast time and attempts to impale them with his stinger. Upon impaling the target, he deals 60% AD physical damage and bonus magic damage and  suppresses them for 1.75 seconds, during which they are  revealed and Skarner can drag them with himself.
Afterwards, the target takes the same damage again.

1.text: Impale's drag ignores  displacement immunity. Skarner is unable to basic attack, cast  Fracture, or use  Flash during Impale.
